ygData.subject: Kill Stealing
ygData.msgSnippet: You guys don t seem to understand why some of us (such as myself) kill steal all the time.  IT IS BECAUSE WE CANNOT FIND GROUPS !!!  simple as that. no groups,
ygData.messageBody:
You guys don't seem to understand why some of us (such as myself) kill
steal all the time. IT IS BECAUSE WE CANNOT FIND GROUPS !!! simple as that.
no groups, KS ! thats it. I don't feel like sitting on my ass for 30 - 40 min
waiting for ppl to group, while shouting all the time.

1) people hate us for shouting so much
2) people don't message us even if they need group member (weird)

You ppl who are against kill stealers by shouting their names out so no one
will group them are so god damn stupid, all you have to do is group with them
and BINGO !! no more kill stealing. If i am getting good xp , why kill steal
?? there is no point for me to risk my life trying to get xp from some monster
6 others are beating up on. I rarely die in a group since I stand so far back,
but while kill stealing if i beat them up too much, the mob might run to me with
no one else helping. If you really want to stop kill stealing, then just group
with those people so you guys can take on higher mobs together. I would
happily stop KS anytime during the day to Group with ppl passing by. I only KS
while waiting for groups and i do shout for groups while i KS as well.
People are stupid and don't know how to stop a problem, oh well... what can you
do ?
